text: Calathea hagbergii is a species of flowering plant in the family Marantaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador, where it is known from only a single collection.Muriel, P. & Pitman, N. 2004. Calathea hagbergii. The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species 2004. Downloaded on 16 September 2015.Calathea hagbergii.
